sentence.Network_en: Let him go, I beseech you!
She continued to beseech him not to disturb her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她仍旧求他不要打搅她.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... berate ? v. 严责 beseech ? v. 祈求，恳求 besmirch ? v. 诽谤，玷污.
英语二级口笔译大纲疑难词汇 - 豆丁网 ... beret n. 贝雷帽 beseech v. 恳求, 哀求 bespeak v. 预订;预言；预示：.
自己总结不定词--过去式--过去分词 - 豆丁网 ... bereave 使……失去； 使……孤寂 beseech 恳求，哀求；乞求 besought 恳求.
...application n. 请求，申请；应用，应用程序beseech v. 祈求，恳求conjure v. 恳求，祈求；变魔术，变戏法.

list.abs: I beseech your favor ., 我恳求您帮忙.
I beseech your favor ., 我恳求您帮忙.
Remain , my little Theodule , I beseech you ., 留下来 , 我的小忒阿杜勒 , 我求你.
now I beseech you to tell the tale , as it should be told , and to go find your sister in Nevu' Alon .现在我恳求你去讲述这个故事，这才是真相，也希望你在内缪·埃伦能找到你的姐姐。
I beseech you to forgive me ., 我乞求你宽恕我.
accept , I beseech thee , the freewill offerings of my mouth , O LORD , and teach me thy judgments .耶和华阿、求你悦纳我口中的赞美为供物、又将你的典章教训我。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from be-(as an intensifier) + Old English  sēcan (see seek)

encyclopedia.content: Beseech是一支来自瑞典的乐队，他们的家乡是靠近Gothenburg的Boras。自从1992的11月年建立以来，Beseech的历史已逾十九年。不过，十年之间他们总共才推出了三张专辑，以至于很多喜欢他们的歌迷对他们的作品采取了和乐队名称一致的态度--"恳求" 。: )玩笑开罢，书归正传，还是来说说Beseech的历史吧。 和很多极端金属乐队一样，成立初期的Beseech同样是地下金属音乐界的一员。1994年，他们为一家比利时公司——Shiver re

entry.def: If you beseech someone to do something, you ask them very eagerly and anxiously.

example.ex: She beseeched him to cut his drinking and his smoking...
'Please stay and read to me, mummy,' he beseeched.
example.tran: “求求你留下来给我读点东西吧，妈妈，”他央求道。

sentences.sentence: "The prophet bid all people to become good persons"

auth_sentence.content: Mrs. Lincoln took the opportunity to beseech him to change it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mrs. Lincoln took the opportunity to beseech him to change it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mrs. Lincoln took the opportunity to beseech him to change it.

auth_sentence.content: I beseech you, sir, to countenance William Visor...against Clement Perkes.
auth_sentence.res_content: I beseech you, sir, to countenance William Visor...against Clement Perkes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I beseech you, sir, to countenance William Visor...against Clement Perkes.

auth_sentence.content: Despite this, the pious beseech God to turn away hurricanes, and the superstious pay astrologers for advice on how to avoid them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Despite this, the pious beseech God to turn away hurricanes, and the superstious pay astrologers for advice on how to avoid them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Despite this, the pious beseech God to turn away hurricanes, and the superstious pay astrologers for advice on how to avoid them.

sentences.en: They beseeched him to go at once.
